title: Part D
stimulusHtml:
1 point is earned for the answer of "yes" with x = 1

1 point is earned for the explanation

Yes, the graph g is tangent to the x-axis at x = 1 g(1) = 0 and g'(1) = 0
descriptions:

1 point is earned for the answer of "yes" with x = 1

1 point is earned for the explanation

Yes, the graph g is tangent to the x-axis at x = 1 g(1) = 0 and g'(1) = 0

1 point is earned for the answer of "yes" with x = 1

Yes, the graph g is tangent to the x-axis at x = 1 g(1) = 0 and g'(1) = 0

The student response earns all of the following points:

1 point is earned for the explanation

Yes, the graph g is tangent to the x-axis at x = 1 g(1) = 0 and g'(1) = 0
